metadata.title: Thomas Jefferson First Inaugural Address (analyzed by Llama 4 Scout)
metadata.summary: This narrative exhibits a strong moral framework with high scores in Dignity, Truth, Hope, Justice, and Pragmatism. The low scores in Tribalism, Fear, Resentment, Manipulation, and Fantasy indicate a commitment to positive values. The Center of Mass (COM) and Moral Polarity Score (MPS) suggest a narrative that emphasizes unity, fairness, and optimism, with a pragmatic approach to governance.
